wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Peter Sutton (born 29 November 1985) is an English cricketer who has played for Somerset, Wiltshire and Herefordshire.  He is a right-handed batsman and right arm medium-fast bowler. He made his first-class debut for Somerset against Cardiff MCC University, on 31 March 2012.
